API
Last Published: 2011-09-13  | Version: 0.9.9
Parent Project
  • Semantic Versioning
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Usage

What is this?

This simple command line tool looks at Java JAR files and determine API changes. You might download self contained JAR file from github.

Diff

Dumps all changes between two JARs on standard output.

% java -jar semantic-versioning-0.9.9.jar previousJar currentJar (includes) (excludes)
Class org.project.MyClass
 Added Class 
Class org.project.MyClass2
 Added Method method1
 Removed Field field1
 Changed Field field2 removed: final

Check

Checks compatibility type between two JARs.

% java -jar semantic-versioning-0.9.9.jar previousJar currentJar (includes) (excludes)
BACKWARD_COMPATIBLE_IMPLEMENTER

Infer

Infers JAR version based on a previously versioned JAR.

% java -jar semantic-versioning-0.9.9.jar previousVersion previousJar currentJar (includes) (excludes)
1.0.0

Validate

Validates JAR version based on a previously versioned JAR.

% java -jar semantic-versioning-0.9.9.jar previousVersion previousJar currentVersion currentJar (includes) (excludes)
true
